chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 12 mini has a problem:
The device does not detect the SIM card, it only says 'no service'. I have already contacted my phone company and tried everything, so I think the issue will be with the eSIM tray.
At first, I thought it was a card failure, but I changed that card and the new one doesn't read it either.
Thank you,

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we have insufficient stock for exchange. Instead, we have processed the full refund. Thank you for your understanding.

Regards,
JY
